headline: A Look At Tyson Foods (TSN) Valuation After Its New US$500 Million Senior Notes Offering
summary: Tyson Foods (TSN) has just completed a $500 million offering of 4.950% senior unsecured notes due 2036, a financing move that reshapes its capital structure and matters for equity investors focused on liquidity and debt terms. See our latest analysis for Tyson Foods. The new senior notes come after a Q1 earnings season where banks adjusted their expectations for Tyson Foods, and the share price has quietly built momentum, with an 11.70% 90 day share price return and a 9.40% 1 year total...
